content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position 0, 0)
- Boiler (position 0, 1)
- Offshore pump (position 0, 2)

### Copper plate mine at position(-28.5, -61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -28.5, -61.5) and a furnace (position -28.5, -60.5)
- Burner mining drill (position -28.5, -60.5) and a furnace (position -28.5, -59.5)

### Copper cable factory at position(2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position 2, 0) and inserter (position 2, 1) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position 2, 2) that connects the furnace at position 2.0 to assembling machine at position 2.0

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to insufficient ingredients in furnaces
- Check the inventory and ensure that the necessary ingredients are available before attempting to use furnaces.
